info.name: Way of the Monk
info.description: The great Taoist master Chuang Tzu once dreamt that he was a butterfly fluttering here and there. In the dream he had no awareness of his individuality as a person. He was only a butterfly. Suddenly, he awoke and found himself laying there, a person once again.
info.additionalInfo:
But then he thought to himself,

"Was I before a man who dreamt about being a butterfly, or am I now a butterfly who dreams about being a man?"


Enjoy the skin, love Apha.


VERSION HISTORY:


Version 0.1 - 27/04/14 [A MONK IS BORN]

Version 0.2 - 28/04/14 (Revamped colouring system)

Version 0.3 - 29/04/14 (Cohesive improvements)

Version 0.4 - 29/04/14 (Made chat text slightly less black, easier on the eyes now)

Version 0.9 - 29/04/14 (Fixed hovering issues, everything near completion)

Version 1 {FINAL} 30/04/14 - (Base HTML Background reskinned, completely revamped room with subtle color differentials, mod users are now highlighted in a low contrast grey, chat files are a slightly brighter grey.)

Version 2.0 15/05/14  - Added support for Radio, as well as reskinning of HTML to light gray, user is highlighted light purple when mentioned in chat, and mods are now a slightly darker cream color.
